Installation

Prerequisites

These are libraries that must be installed for the program to operate normally. Before proceeding with the program, install the library required by this page.

requirements

External Source

We will explain how to install the OCR program and how to install the flask. And explain how to create a virtual environment and run it on localhost.

Install OCR and Flask before entering the code.

OCR

Install tesseract to use OCR application in OCR_RUN.py.

  • Windows

    https://github.com/UB-Mannheim/tesseract/wiki/

  • Mac

    brew install tesseract

  • Linux

    sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install libleptonica-dev
sudo apt-get install tesseract-ocr tesseract-ocr-dev
sudo apt-get install libtesseract-dev

Flask

To use Papago translation, Flask should be installed. Please refer to the flask installation, version page.

[Flask Installation]

[Version Check]
